abstract: Prism Skylabs has built a technology that recycles security camera footage with the goal of delivering real-time analytics about a store or location.
snippet: Prism Skylabs has built a technology that recycles security camera footage with the goal of delivering real-time analytics about a store or location.
lead_paragraph: Prism Skylabs, a San Francisco-based start-up, is in the recycling business.

headline.main: Prism Plans to Recycle Security Camera Images
